title: AIIMS Bathinda Jobs 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Project Research Scientist II, Project Technical Support I Posts
description: The All India Institute of Medical Sciences Bathinda (AIIMS Bathinda) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Project Research Scientist-II, Project Technical Support-I Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, BDS, DNB, MD/MS, Post-graduation, 10th, 12th, Diploma, and Ph.D. can apply for the AIIMS Bathinda Jobs 2025 . The interested app...
